tool_description: Access the Biblical Holydays and Sabbaths using the Enoch Calendar
name: Enoch Calendar
title: Enoch Calendar

api_list.name: Get Calendar Components
api_list.description: Get the calendar components to build the current Hebrew month calendar from the supplied Hebrew month number, if supplied, or the first Hebrew month and, a supplied year, or this year
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://enoch-calendar.p.rapidapi.com/date-elements/7/2021"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "enoch-calendar.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://enoch-calendar.p.rapidapi.com/date-elements/{month}/{year}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "enoch-calendar.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Count of Days
api_list.description: Current day count in this Hebrew year from the supplied date string or today's date

required_parameters.name: datestring
required_parameters.description: The date that you want to know the number of the day of the Hebrew year

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://enoch-calendar.p.rapidapi.com/count-of-days/2021-03-30"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "enoch-calendar.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://enoch-calendar.p.rapidapi.com/count-of-days/{datestring}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "enoch-calendar.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Is Holyday
api_list.description: Get the Holyday, corresponding Scritpures and if this Holyday is also a Sabbath from the supplied date string or today's date. Or false in for all returned properties
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://enoch-calendar.p.rapidapi.com/is-holyday/2021-03-30"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "enoch-calendar.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Hebrew Date
